title: OCDC Poll Configuration
description: Configuration schema for ocdc poll configs that automate devcontainer sessions with OpenCode

id.description: Unique identifier for this poll configuration

source_type.description: Source type determines fetch command defaults, item mappings, and prompt templates

fetch.description: Fetch options (alternative to fetch_command). Options vary by source_type.

assignee.description: Filter by assignee. Use @me for current user. (linear_issue, github_issue)

author.description: Filter by PR author. Use @me for current user. (github_pr)

review_requested.description: Filter by review requested. Use @me for current user. (github_pr)

state.description: Filter by state. String for GitHub (open/closed), array for Linear (started/unstarted/etc)

labels.description: Filter to items with these labels (GitHub)

repo.description: Limit to specific repository (owner/repo format). Mutually exclusive with repos.

repos.description: Limit to multiple repositories (owner/repo format). Mutually exclusive with repo. (github_issue, github_pr)

fetch_command.description: Shell command that outputs a JSON array of items. Mutually exclusive with 'fetch'.

repo_filters.description: Rules for mapping items to local repositories. Most specific rule wins.

labels.description: Labels to match - item must have ANY of these (case-insensitive)

repo.description: GitHub repository to match (owner/repo format, case-insensitive)

repo_path.description: Local filesystem path to repository (supports ~ expansion)

item_mapping.description: Optional jq expressions to extract fields. Defaults provided per source_type.

key.description: jq expression for unique item identifier

repo_short.description: jq expression for short repository name

number.description: jq expression for issue/PR number or identifier

branch.description: jq expression for git branch name

prompt.description: Optional prompt configuration. Defaults provided per source_type.

file.description: Path to prompt file (relative to config directory)

session.description: Optional session configuration. Defaults provided per source_type.

name_template.description: Template for tmux session name with {variable} placeholders

agent.description: OpenCode agent to use. Defaults: github_pr=plan, others=build

cleanup.description: Cleanup configuration for when source items are closed/merged. When enabled, ocdc poll will check for closed/merged PRs and issues, then clean up resources after a grace period.

enabled.description: Whether to enable automatic cleanup detection and execution

on.description: Terminal states that trigger cleanup. Use 'merged' for merged PRs, 'closed' for closed PRs/issues, 'completed'/'cancelled' for Linear issues.

delay.description: Grace period before cleanup executes. Supports: 30s (seconds), 5m (minutes), 2h (hours). Plain number treated as minutes.

actions.description: Cleanup actions to perform in order. 'kill_session' kills the tmux session, 'stop_container' runs ocdc down, 'remove_clone' removes the clone directory (only if git is clean).

not.description: fetch and fetch_command are mutually exclusive
